about_the_game:
Rez Infinite Digital Deluxe DLC includes:

  • Singularity X (Area X tracks from Rez Infinite) full soundtrack
  • Over 20 desktop wallpapers, including original concept art.
  • A digital soundtrack sampler including new, never-before released tracks.
  • A set of original Rez avatars.
  • A digital excerpt from the iam8bit-created Making-of Rez / art book.

---

Singularity X Soundtrack Tracklist:

  • Prologue
  • Awakening
  • Wide Echoes
  • Cycle of Silence
  • Two Dreams
  • Red
  • Deeplights
  • Butterfly Effect
  • Starlight Infinite
  • Singularity X (Ending Edit)
  • Singularity X
  • Butterfly Effect (Instrumental Mix)

=====

Soundtrack Sampler OST Tracklist:

  1. Awakening
  2. Wide Echoes
  3. Cycle of Silence
  4. Butterfly Effect
  5. Butterfly Effect (Instrumental Mix)
  6. Singularity
  7. Starlight Infinite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
